title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 November 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 02:20): XWiki.FADIERJeanMarie was modified by XWiki.FADIERJeanMarie (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/FADIERJeanMarie  
gwash - (27/11/2008 08:32): where can i get a full reference on xwiki's class properties, class sheets, etc..?  
asiri - (27/11/2008 09:46): hi all, is there a place where i can find various access levels required to perform an action ? like to delete a page, add an attachment and so on ? I'm referring to XwikiContext.getWiki().getRightService().hasAccessLevel("view"...) method, i'm not sure which access levels to be checked for which operations.  
asiri - (27/11/2008 09:52): ok, found XWikiRightServiceImpl and few possible access levels.  
asiri - (27/11/2008 09:56): i'm guessing making an attachment requires 'edit' access levels ? bit unclear.  
asiri - (27/11/2008 10:37): oh yeah, found it!  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:03): Main.I2GcurrikiBuild was modified by xwiki:XWiki.polx (updating installation instructions) - http://curriki.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/I2GcurrikiBuild  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:34): XWiki.ElenaOanaTabaranu was modified by XWiki.ElenaOanaTabaranu - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/ElenaOanaTabaranu  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:39): Main.LuceneSearch was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (Rollback to version 46.1) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/LuceneSearch  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:42): Main.LuceneSearch was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (allow comment right for XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/LuceneSearch  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:42): Main.LuceneSearch was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (allow edit right for XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/LuceneSearch  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:42): Main.LuceneSearch was modified by XWiki.VincentMassol (allow delete right for XWiki.XWikiAdminGroup) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/LuceneSearch  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:50): XWiki.ElenaOanaTabaranu was modified by XWiki.ElenaOanaTabaranu - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/ElenaOanaTabaranu  
xwikibot - (27/11/2008 11:51): XWiki.ElenaOanaTabaranu was modified by XWiki.ElenaOanaTabaranu - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/ElenaOanaTabaranu  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:54): hmm I want to create a page which have an object, it's possible to define the value of an object in the html form used to create the new page ?  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:55): for example <input type="hidden" name="webname" value="Server"/> is used to specify the namespace, it's possible to have the same thing for a property?  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:55): jvdrean: ?;p  
jvdrean - (27/11/2008 16:56): it is :)  
jvdrean - (27/11/2008 16:56): XWiki.MyClass\_propertyName  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:56): just using the property name?  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:56): hmm  
jvdrean - (27/11/2008 16:56): is the name to use for the input  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:56): ok, I'll try, thanks  
jvdrean - (27/11/2008 16:57): classname + property name  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:57): separated by \_ ?  
jvdrean - (27/11/2008 16:58): yes  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:58): ok  
asyd - (27/11/2008 16:58): thanks
